title: Fragment, 1750–1800
dimensions: Warp x Weft (left selvedge present): 28.1 x 52.9 cm (11 1/16 x 20 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Curving trails of polychrome flowers crossing ruffled ribbons moving in the other direction on a ground of brown and white checks.

Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. silk
